about.me: Our main missing is to contribute with Cardano's blockchain, by staking our rewards and our delagator's ADA, to garantee the security of the network.
about.server: Our infrastructure is powered by AWS Cloud, with 2 nodes running 24/7 and 365 days. we aim to have 99.9% availability time.
about.company: Begin is a DeFi wallet that will connect you with DApps and provide the easiest way of being part of a new financial world.
